name: minions-qa-suites-workspace
description: Test suite definitions, test cases, and assertions for validating clawspace toolboxes
author: Mehdi Nabhani <mehdi@the-mehdi.com> (https://the-mehdi.com)

scripts.build: pnpm --filter @minions-qa-suites/sdk run build && pnpm --filter @minions-qa-suites/cli run build && pnpm --filter @minions-qa-suites/docs run build && pnpm --filter @minions-qa-suites/blog run build && pnpm --filter @minions-qa-suites/web run build
scripts.deploy:blog: pnpm --filter @minions-qa-suites/blog run build && netlify deploy --dir apps/blog/dist --prod
scripts.deploy:docs: pnpm --filter @minions-qa-suites/docs run build && netlify deploy --dir apps/docs/dist --prod
scripts.deploy:web: pnpm --filter @minions-qa-suites/web run build && netlify deploy --dir apps/web/dist --prod
scripts.lint: pnpm --filter @minions-qa-suites/sdk run build && pnpm --filter @minions-qa-suites/sdk run lint && pnpm --filter @minions-qa-suites/cli run lint
